AssociatedAwsPrincipal.description:
The unique identifier of the principal for which the specified view was made the default for the AWS Region that contains the view. For example:

`123456789012`

description: Sets the specified view as the default for the AWS Region in which you call this operation. If a user makes a search query that doesn't explicitly specify the view to use, Resource Explorer chooses this default view automatically for searches performed in this AWS Region .

ViewArn.description: The ARN of the view to set as the default for the AWS Region and AWS account in which you call this operation. The specified view must already exist in the specified Region.
